bibl.title: The Hadra Vases.
bibl.note: Diss. (unpublished) Univ. Amsterdam, 1992. - Appendix A offers text and translation of 132 inscriptions incised or written on Hadra hydriae. - Cf. S.E.G. LV, 1780: compilation (by K.A. WORP) of a concordance of the inscriptions in Appendix A with S.B. and S.E.G.; - 1781-1805: inscriptions not in S.B. or S.E.G.
bibl.seg: ENKLAAR Arnold H., The Hadra Vases.
